name: Flags Marathon
description:
* Arabic only supported *

Flags Marathon is a quiz game centered around flags through a long race of many questions, but interesting and fun at the same time.

The race consists long list questions that change over time! You must answer all questions within the specified time and without errors to complete the race.

Game features
⭐️ Increase your knowledge of countries and their flags in an entertaining and informative way
⭐️ More than 190 flags from around the world
⭐️ Contain various questions that change over time
⭐️ Various difficulty levels from easy to hard
⭐️ Play it with your friends or family members and challenge them

The game is under continuous development, so we welcome all your constructive suggestions and your inquiries. We hope that you like the game. 👌
